title: Bhutan Current Account
description: Bhutan recorded a Current Account deficit of 21777.60 BTN Million in 2020. Current Account in Bhutan averaged -11217.79 BTN Million from 1991 until 2020, reaching an all time high of 3707.50 BTN Million in 2007 and a record low of -41367.30 BTN Million in 2015. Current Account is the sum of the balance of trade (exports minus imports of goods and services), net factor income (such as interest and dividends) and net transfer payments (such as foreign aid). This page provides - Bhutan Current Account - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Royal Monetary Authority of Bhutan
